author: Rebecca Shabad
title: GOP governor: Reopening the U.S. will be 'just as tough, if not tougher' than start of coronavirus outbreak
description: With no end in sight in the coronavirus outbreak and as President Donald Trump eyes a decision to reopen the government, Ohio Gov. Mike DeWine said Monday that the U.S. won’t be able to “turn a switch” and return to normalcy.
content:
WASHINGTON With no end in sight in the coronavirus outbreak and as President Donald Trump eyes a decision to reopen the government, Ohio Gov. Mike DeWine said Monday that the U.S. wont be able to turn a switch and return to normalcy.
Whenever we open up, how… [+2092 chars]
